狗仗人勢.definition: a dog threatens based on master's power (idiom); to use one's position to bully others

狗吃屎.definition: to fall flat on one's face (vulgar)

狗咬呂洞賓，不識好人心.pinyin: gou3 yao3 Lu:3 Dong4 bin1 , bu4 shi2 hao3 ren2 xin1
狗咬呂洞賓，不識好人心.definition: a dog biting Lü Dongbin (idiom); to ill reward a person's kindness

狗嘴裏吐不出象牙.pinyin: gou3 zui3 li5 tu3 bu4 chu1 xiang4 ya2
狗嘴裏吐不出象牙.definition: lit. no ivory comes from the mouth of a dog (idiom); fig. one does not expect fine words from a scoundrel

狗尾續貂.definition: lit. to use a dog's tail as a substitute for sable fur (idiom); fig. a worthless sequel to a masterpiece

狗帶.definition: (Internet slang) to go away; to slink off; (transliteration of "go die", possibly from 去死[qu4 si3])

狗急跳牆.definition: a cornered dog will jump over the wall (idiom); to be driven to desperate action

狗扯羊皮.definition: to fuss around; to buzz about uselessly; to wag one's tongue

狗拿耗子.definition: lit. a dog who catches mice; to be meddlesome (idiom)

狗改不了吃屎.pinyin: gou3 gai3 bu4 liao3 chi1 shi3
狗改不了吃屎.definition: lit. a dog can't stop himself from eating shit (idiom); fig. bad habits are hard to change

狗日.definition: lit. fucked or spawned by a dog; contemptible; lousy, fucking

狗爬式.definition: dog paddle (swimming style); doggy style (sex position)

狗男女.definition: a couple engaged in an illicit love affair; a cheating couple

狗皮膏藥.definition: dogskin plaster, used in TCM for treating contusions, rheumatism etc; quack medicine; sham goods

狗竇.definition: dog hole; gap caused by missing teeth; fig. den of thieves

狗竇大開.definition: dog hole wide open (idiom); fig. gap caused by missing teeth (used mockingly)

狗糧.definition: dog food; (Internet slang) public display of affection (term used by singles 單身狗|单身狗[dan1 shen1 gou3] forced to "eat" it)

狗腿子.definition: dog's leg; fig. one who follows a villain; henchman; hired thug

狗血淋頭.definition: lit. to pour dog's blood on (idiom); fig. torrent of abuse

狗逮老鼠.definition: lit. a dog who catches mice (idiom); fig. to be meddlesome

狗雜種.definition: son of a bitch; damn bastard

狗頭軍師.definition: (derog.) inept advisor; a good-for-nothing adviser; one who offers bad advice
